"wenath ratakin wisandum soyanawata wada anek ratawalwalatath aadarshayak gatha haki, apita api ganama abhimanayak athi kara gatha haki wana wisandum sewima, katuka amihiri athdakim athi api mathu parapura wenuwen kala yuthu karyabharaya yayida ma sandahan karanna kamathiyi," yanuwenda janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.mewara aya waya wiwadaya pawathwenne uthureda prajathanthrawadi palath sabhawak thora path kara ganu labimen anathuruwa shri lankawa wishesha sandhisthanayakata piwisa sitina awasthawaka bawa sandahan kala janadhipathi rajapaksha, siya digu kalina athdakim thaman samanga beda ganna men wisheshayenma aar sambandhan manthriwarayata saha uthure maha amathi siwi wigneshwaranta aaradhana karana bawada kiya sitiyeya.uthuru pradeshaye rajya sewawan shakthimath kirima, thraibhasha wadapiliwela pulul kirima saha niwasa saha jiwanopaya marga sanwardhanaya kirima kerehi aanduwe wishesha awadhanaya yomu wi thibena bawath janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.
